About This Project

Weather Forecast Application

A modern, real-time weather application built with Next.js 15, React 19, and TypeScript. Get accurate weather forecasts with beautiful, dynamic backgrounds that change based on current weather conditions and time of day.

Features

  • ‚ñπReal-time weather data from WeatherAPI.com
  • ‚ñπ3-day weather forecast
  • ‚ñπHourly temperature predictions
  • ‚ñπDynamic backgrounds based on weather conditions (day/night)
  • ‚ñπSearch any city worldwide
  • ‚ñπResponsive and mobile-friendly design
  • ‚ñπBeautiful UI with Tailwind CSS

Technologies Used

  • ‚ñπNext.js 15 - React framework with App Router
  • ‚ñπReact 19 - Latest version with improved performance
  • ‚ñπTypeScript - Type-safe development
  • ‚ñπTailwind CSS 4 - Modern utility-first CSS
  • ‚ñπAxios - HTTP client for API requests
  • ‚ñπLucide React - Beautiful icon library
  • ‚ñπWeatherAPI.com - Weather data provider

Weather Conditions

The application displays different background images based on:

  • ‚Ä¢Clear sky (day/night)
  • ‚Ä¢Sunny conditions
  • ‚Ä¢Cloudy weather (day/night)
  • ‚Ä¢Overcast conditions (day/night)
  • ‚Ä¢Rainy weather (day/night)
  • ‚Ä¢Snow (day/night)
  • ‚Ä¢Storms and thunder (day/night)

How It Works

  1. 1.Enter a city name in the search box
  2. 2.The app fetches real-time weather data from WeatherAPI
  3. 3.Background automatically changes based on weather and time
  4. 4.View current temperature, conditions, and forecasts
  5. 5.See hourly predictions and 3-day forecast
